title: Request a Dumpster Swap-Out
description: The construction debris dumpster on site is full. The site superintendent needs to request a swap-out from the waste management company.

tasks.description: Identify the waste management vendor for the project.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies 'ABC Waste Services' as the vendor.

tasks.description: Contact the vendor to schedule a swap-out of the full 40-yard dumpster for an empty one.
tasks.expected_outcome: A dumpster swap is successfully scheduled for the next morning.
